backend/main.mo: Actor defines profile, matching, messaging, blocking, and payment method types and stores, with access‑controlled profile management and a discovery feed.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, associated files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries describing the purpose of major frontend source files.
frontend/.ic-assets.json5: ICP asset canister config enforcing serving from dist/, cache rules, CSP headers, and ignoring source files.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide explaining production build requirements, build verification, and correct serving of dist/ artifacts.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base and theme tokens defining color system and light/dark mode variables.
frontend/index.html: Dev-time HTML entry with boot‑fallback UI and script loading via /src/main.tsx plus error/fallback logic.
frontend/netlify.toml: Netlify build and hosting config that builds, verifies dist/, applies SPA routing, and sets caching and security headers.
frontend/scripts/verify-dist-index.mjs: Node script verifying dist/index.html exists, avoids dev paths, and includes production asset references.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the main React app with routing, authentication checks, profile onboarding redirects, and global providers.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Provides the shared layout with header, main content area, and bottom navigation.
frontend/src/components/Auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access denied message for restricted admin pages with a button to return home.
frontend/src/components/Auth/AccountMenu: Renders the user account dropdown with profile info, navigation links, admin access, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/Auth/LoginButton: Handles Internet Identity login/logout with loading states and retry logic.
frontend/src/components/Brand/AppLogo.ts: Displays the app’s heart icon and Spark brand text.
frontend/src/components/Chat/MessageComp: Provides a text input and send button for composing and sending chat messages.
frontend/src/components/Chat/MessageList: Shows a scrollable list of chat messages and auto-scrolls to the newest message.
frontend/src/components/Discover/Discove: Shows an empty state when no profiles remain and provides a refresh button.
frontend/src/components/Discover/Profile: Displays a dating profile card with photo navigation, like/pass actions, and user blocking.
frontend/src/components/Matches/MatchesE: Shows an empty state for matches with a link to start discovering profiles.
frontend/src/components/Navigation/Botto: Renders the mobile bottom navigation bar with links to Discover, Matches, and Profile.
frontend/src/components/Navigation/Heade: Displays the top header with the app logo and user account menu.
frontend/src/components/Profile/PhotoPic: Renders a selectable grid of predefined avatar images and manages up to five selected photos via callbacks.
frontend/src/components/Profile/ProfileF: Form for creating or editing a dating profile with validation, image selection, and submission to save the profile.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and utilities for Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for profiles, discovery, likes, matches, and messages using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables defining light and dark theme color tokens and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, React Query, and Internet Identity provider setup.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin panel page that checks admin status, displays the user's principal ID, and provides administrative UI sections.
frontend/src/pages/AuthPage.tsx: Landing page showing branding, feature highlights, and a login button for authentication.
frontend/src/pages/ChatPage.tsx: Displays a chat interface for a selected match, loading profile and messages and handling blocked state.
frontend/src/pages/DiscoverPage.tsx: Provides a swipe-style discovery feed where users can like or pass profiles and refresh the list.
frontend/src/pages/MatchDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed profile information for a match with photo carousel, block/unblock actions, and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/MatchesPage.tsx: Placeholder matches list page currently showing an empty state until backend support is added.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentMethodsPage.ts: Manages saved payment methods including add, edit, delete, and set default functionality with validation.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Displays and edits the current user's profile, supporting onboarding and standard profile updates.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routes), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugins for styling the frontend.
frontend/vercel.json: Defines Vercel deployment settings, including build command, SPA rewrites, and cache-control headers for HTML and assets.
project_state.json: Stores project-wide state, versioning, feature lists, and notes about current production build issues.
